```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2023-03-14')

drugs <- tuesdata$drugs

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(drugs, aes(y = generic)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = accelerated_assessment)) +
  labs(
    y = "Generic Medicine",
    x = "Drug Count",
    fill = "Accelerated Assessment"
  )
```
